items.title: EU Passes Landmark AI Governance Framework
items.description: European Parliament approves comprehensive rules requiring transparency and risk assessments for AI systems.

items.title: Major Earthquake Strikes Central Turkey, Rescue Efforts Underway
items.description: A 6.8 magnitude earthquake hit the Malatya province, with emergency teams deployed across the region.

items.title: Tesla Unveils Next-Generation Battery With 50% More Range
items.description: The new solid-state cells promise to push electric vehicles past 600 miles on a single charge.

items.title: WHO Declares End to Mpox Global Health Emergency
items.description: The World Health Organization lifted the emergency status after sustained decline in cases worldwide.

items.title: India's GDP Growth Accelerates to 7.2% in Q4
items.description: Strong manufacturing output and domestic consumption drove the fastest quarterly expansion in two years.
